text: Vire-Normandie is a commune. It is found in the region Normandy in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 and consists of the former communes of Vire (the seat), Coulonces, Maisoncelles-la-Jourdan, Roullours, Saint-Germain-de-Tallevende-la- Lande-Vaumont, Truttemer-le-Grand, Truttemer-le-Petit and Vaudry.Arrêté préfectoral 31 December 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Calvados Category:Subprefectures in France
title: Vire-Normandie
